notes.title: Funding
notes.p: This research was funded by CAPES–Coordenação de Aperfeiçoamento de Pessoal de Nível Superior, scholarship number (88881.119611/2016-01) and UEPG–Universidade Estadual de Ponta Grossa. The bed bug research was supported by USDA-Discovery & Development of Natural Products based insect management for medical, veterinary & Urban (58-6066-6-043).
